abstract: Britain, as part of plan to spend about $268 million to improve facilities in Falkland Islands and bolster its defense systems, adds two transport helicopters and enhanced communications system.
lead_paragraph: Britain plans to add two transport helicopters and an enhanced communications system to its defense systems on the Falkland Islands.
snippet: Britain plans to add two transport helicopters and an enhanced communications system to its defense systems on the Falkland Islands.
